name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a playful tabby who loves chasing laser pointers and sleeping in sunny spots.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a majestic black cat with green eyes. She's the queen of the house and knows it!

name: Oliver
description: Oliver is an orange tabby who can't get enough treats. He's always hungry and very vocal about it.

name: Bella
description: Bella is a gentle calico who loves to curl up in laps and purr for hours.

name: Max
description: Max is our newest family member, a tuxedo kitten with endless energy and curiosity.

name: Sophie
description: Sophie is a wise Siamese who prefers quiet meditation spots and occasional gentle pets.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a gray tabby who's obsessed with watching birds through the window.

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a fluffy Maine Coon mix who loves to be brushed and pampered.
